thought: To craft a golden_carrot, I need to place 8 gold_nugget and 1 carrot in the crafting table. The gold_nugget is at slot 40 and the carrot is at slot 39, so I will move the gold_nugget to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 40 to slot 1 with quantity 1
